title: Custom Game Bots [New Client]
body:
I know it is a bit early but, **bots can not be added** (or at least I do not know how to yet) **in custom games in the new client.**
I am someone who spends time playing 1v5 against bots when I am low on time and I can not play a PVP match or when I want to practise jungle paths (especially with the new jungle out) or builds; and not being able to play against bots with this new client out bothers me a bit.

replies.body: Bots aren't enabled yet on the updated client.  I don't have any eta's on when it will come out, but keep your eye out between patches.  If you have any concerns or questions though, hit up the client devs over at the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).    Hang on and help test other features until then.
Any update on this? Still doesn't seem available.
J/w will bot Ai ever get updated? Do Doom Bots have better Ai or just "OP" abilities? It would be hilarious to get flash taunted by a Bot Rammus or something like that.

Just googled this exact issue to see if I was missing something.  I very frequently do the same thing, 1v5 intermediate bots.  I find it very relaxing and stress relieving after a long day's work.  I've actually probably played this way more than not for the past year.  Pretty sad that it's not available yet :(

Is there any way to revert back to the old client in the meantime?

at the bottom of the new client launch, there is a return to legacy client button. click on that and you can use the old client. (I do the same things to practice jungle paths) {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yes, thx from me too
ya no problem ;)
Perfect, thank you so much!
I am so glad I am not the only one who was worried about this. <3
Same. How else am I gonna git gud without embarrassing myself? {{champion:92}}  lol
Rip ; - ; I liked playing 1 vs 5 against bots to test out things T_T
Not only that ; it's great to learn to control minion waves
Guys please help me, i cant add bots i just dont find it please help me xD i wanna go 1k and more nasus stacks but nooh Rito why
the point is people spend tons of money on this game and cant even play a bot game its ridiculous.

Going back to legacy would be great... except all I get when logging into old client is "Unspecified Error Occurred" Please check the logs.
(Any advice on where the logs are would be appreciated please.) [Edit - Found them.]
 
On the new client no such warnings.... but .... no bots.

As someone new to the game and who is getting to grips with the game using bot games, this leaves me a bit up the creek as they say.
On the log-in screen of the new client, in the bottom right, there is "Launch Legacy Client" and that's the old client.
You can just switch to the old client if you wanna play against bots.
I solved the problem with the client crashing for me by starting the client by "right click" -> run as administrator
{{champion:84}} fck off
Switching back to the old client would be great, except the fact that every time I try, it crashes. Fix your shit Riot.
i have the same problem with the new client,because i play 1 vs 5 with bots also and now i just can so pls riot FIX IT <3

Hi guys, i was stuck with the same issue until i remembered that you can switch back to old/current client. This on that you agreed to install is in Beta atm. So simply click on bottom right of the client launch screen to enable the usual client (legacy) so you can pursue your 1V5 bot game mode to practice or else. As I do.
That's what i do too! When there is about no time to play a normal/ranked i usually play bots to practice some skill
you cannot play bots in custom(or just for now). That sucks{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I had just made a discussion with the same issue in mind. If it's there, the UI is hiding it pretty damn well.
